mapper.select: SELECT EMPL_ID FROM EMPL WHERE COMMON_CODE_DEPT = (SELECT COMMON_CODE_DEPT FROM EMPL WHERE EMPL_ID = #{emplId}) AND COMMON_CODE_CLSF = 'CLSF012'
--부서랑 직급 SELECT COMMON_CODE_DEPT, COMMON_CODE_CLSF FROM EMPL WHERE EMPL_ID = #{emplId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOB_DIARY ( JOB_DIARY_REPORT_DATE, JOB_DIARY_WRTING_EMPL_ID, JOB_DIARY_RECPTN_EMPL_ID, JOB_DIARY_SBJ, JOB_DIARY_CN ) VALUES ( TRUNC(SYSDATE), #{jobDiaryWrtingEmplId}, #{jobDiaryRecptnEmplId}, #{jobDiarySbj}, #{jobDiaryCn} )
mapper.select: SELECT JOB_DIARY_REPORT_DATE, EMPL_NM, JOB_DIARY_SBJ, JOB_DIARY_CN, JOB_DIARY_WRTING_EMPL_ID FROM JOB_DIARY J, EMPL E WHERE J.JOB_DIARY_WRTING_EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID AND E.COMMON_CODE_DEPT = #{commonCodeDept} ORDER BY JOB_DIARY_REPORT_DATE

SELECT EMPL_NM, JOB_DIARY_SBJ, JOB_DIARY_CN FROM JOB_DIARY J, EMPL E WHERE J.JOB_DIARY_WRTING_EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID AND E.EMPL_ID = #{jobDiaryWrtingEmplId} and J.JOB_DIARY_REPORT_DATE = TO_DATE(#{jobDiaryReportDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOB ( JOB_NO, JOB_REQUST_EMPL_ID, JOB_SJ, JOB_CN, JOB_BEGIN_DATE, JOB_CLOS_DATE, JOB_REQUST_DATE, COMMON_CODE_DUTY_KIND ) VALUES ( #{jobNo}, #{jobRequstEmplId}, #{jobSj}, #{jobCn}, #{jobBeginDate}, #{jobClosDate}, TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{commonCodeDutyKind} )
INSERT INTO JOB_PROGRS ( JOB_NO, JOB_RECPTN_EMPL_ID, COMMON_CODE_DUTY_STTUS, COMMON_CODE_DUTY_PROGRS ) VALUES ( #{jobNo}, #{jobRecptnEmplId}, #{commonCodeDutySttus}, #{commonCodeDutyProgrs} )
mapper.select: SELECT J.JOB_NO, J.JOB_REQUST_EMPL_ID, J.JOB_SJ, J.JOB_CN, J.JOB_BEGIN_DATE, J.JOB_CLOS_DATE, J.JOB_REQUST_DATE, J.COMMON_CODE_DUTY_KIND FROM JOB J WHERE J.JOB_REQUST_EMPL_ID = #{jobRequstEmplId} AND J.JOB_NO NOT IN ( SELECT P.JOB_NO FROM JOB_PROGRS P WHERE P.JOB_RECPTN_EMPL_ID = #{jobRequstEmplId} ) ORDER BY J.JOB_NO

SELECT J.JOB_SJ, J.JOB_CN, J.JOB_BEGIN_DATE, J.JOB_CLOS_DATE, J.COMMON_CODE_DUTY_KIND, P.JOB_RECPTN_EMPL_ID, E.EMPL_NM AS JOB_RECPTN_EMPL_NM, P.COMMON_CODE_DUTY_STTUS, P.COMMON_CODE_DUTY_PROGRS FROM JOB J, JOB_PROGRS P, EMPL E WHERE J.JOB_NO = P.JOB_NO AND P.JOB_RECPTN_EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID AND J.JOB_NO = #{jobNo}

SELECT J.JOB_NO, J.JOB_SJ, J.JOB_REQUST_DATE, E.EMPL_NM AS JOB_REQUST_EMPL_NM, U.UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM FROM JOB J, JOB_PROGRS P, EMPL E, UPLOAD_FILE U WHERE J.JOB_NO = P.JOB_NO AND E.PROFL_ETPR_CODE = U.UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE AND J.JOB_REQUST_EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID AND P.COMMON_CODE_DUTY_STTUS = 'DUTY020' AND J.JOB_REQUST_EMPL_ID != #{jobRecptnEmplId} AND P.JOB_RECPTN_EMPL_ID = #{jobRecptnEmplId}

SELECT J.JOB_SJ, J.JOB_CN, J.JOB_BEGIN_DATE, J.JOB_CLOS_DATE, J.COMMON_CODE_DUTY_KIND, E.EMPL_NM AS JOB_REQUST_EMPL_NM FROM JOB J, EMPL E WHERE J.JOB_REQUST_EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID AND J.JOB_NO = #{jobNo}
